How I did it:
1.) Download (hurr durr)
2.) Mount With a Image Manager, (daemon tools, Alcohol 120) I personally used Alcohol 120.
3.) Install
4.) Place Crack that comes with download into the correct directory. 
ex. 
C:\Program Files (x86)\LucasArts\Star Wars Jedi Knight Jedi Academy\GameData

** note **
Program files (x86) may differ pending your what version of windows you are using (if using it at all)
5.)Then enjoy.
May the force be with you!

Had problem to install the second CD at 47%.
But as Moir~ said, this is how you do:

Mount first CD, and when it asks for second cd, just unmount the game on the selected device, then chose the second CD and press "OK", without opening the "browser" button!

For those that have problems...

Download poweriso.  Once that is done download this torrent.  After all that is done then mount the image jk1 to poweriso.  Then do jk2.  Once all of  that is done mount it back to jk1. 

MAKE SURE YOU MOUNT JK1 ALL THE TIME IF U WANT TO PLAY MULTIPLAYER.

It does work fine and its a fun game.  If you have any other problems then you must update your video card.  I use to have a black screen when i first started and it didn't start anything.  I just did a simple update and now it works.  Good luck!
When i start up single player it says i ahve the wrong disk in. I used the disk one iso but nothing still

The disk images are in NRG (Nero proprietary format), which is of course an Evil Thing; thank you for the Daemon Tools installer, spotted jackal, but yet another brain-damaged program is not what I'd like to see on my system. Fortunately there are several things available for turning this format into our beloved ISO -- see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/.nrg#Converting_nrg_files (used the no-install-needed command-line nrg2iso myself).

If you can't get the game to start up (only splash screen, or not even that), you might want to try the fix described at http://lucasforums.com/showthread.php?t=206018 . Should be a pretty universal one; at any rate, worked for me:-)

How do you use the torrent. I am a new user.

26en26en - 1. Install Daemon Tools
                 2. Mount CD1
                 3. Install the game
                 4. When the installer asks for CD2: Unmount CD1 and mount CD2
                 5. When install is ready: Go to the Crack folder and copy jasp.exe to game dir (C:\Program Files\LucasArts\Star Wars Jedi Knight Jedi Academy
